name: Benoit Tigeot
body:
### Benoit Tigeot : Home sweet home

I'm a young developer, experienced sound designer who worked in video games and tv/animations industries.

Here is few project I contribute, I love bots :

* [Dirty ruby irc log bot with **Cinch**, **Sinatra** and boostrap](https://github.com/benoittgt/cinchlogsinat) 
* [Gazouilleur by Regard Citoyen](https://github.com/RouxRC/gazouilleur)
* [Nice text message bot](https://github.com/N3bTcx/Gammu_RssTail) for a friend who love football. 

### Config files

Check my [dotfiles](https://github.com/benoittgt/dotfiles) use them, fork them, etc.

### Contact
benoit at strapontin dot me (PGP)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/benoit_tgt)

*Thanks github for the hosting and theme*
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
